1.6.1.name: wordpress/wp-typogrify
1.6.1.description:
wp-Typogrify is dead. wp-Typogrify has merged with wp-Hyphenate to become wp-Typography, an all-inclusive typography solution. Long live wp-Typogrify!

If you have this plugin installed, please uninstall it and install wp-Typography.

A special thank you is due to Hamish Macpherson who is responsible for the success of wp-Typogrify, and without whom, wp-Typography would not have been possible.
